categories: Category:Events during the Cold War (Galactic Republic–Sith Empire)

nodes.text: After the end of the Great Galactic War, the maverick Sith Lord Darth Malgus began a campaign against the Sith who supported or allowed for the conflict to come to an end with the Treaty of Coruscant. Malgus's first target was the Sith politician Lord Adraas, whom he hunted down sometime during the Cold War. Within Adraas's estate, Malgus engaged his target and ultimately killed him with his bare hands.
